input_paths.title: Input Paths
input_paths.description: List of input paths where the image data is stored as OME-Zarrs. Should point to the parent folder containing one or many OME-Zarr files, not the actual OME-Zarr file. Example: `["/some/path/"]`. This task only supports a single input path. (standard argument for Fractal tasks, managed by Fractal server).

output_path.title: Output Path
output_path.description: This parameter is not used by this task. (standard argument for Fractal tasks, managed by Fractal server).

component.title: Component
component.description: Path to the OME-Zarr image in the OME-Zarr plate that is processed. Example: `"some_plate.zarr/B/03/0"`. (standard argument for Fractal tasks, managed by Fractal server).

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: dictionary containing metadata about the OME-Zarr. This task requires the following elements to be present in the metadata. `coarsening_xy (int)`: coarsening factor in XY of the downsampling when building the pyramid. (standard argument for Fractal tasks, managed by Fractal server).

label_image_name.title: Label Image
label_image_name.description: Name of the label image to be clipped. Needs to exist in OME-Zarr file

clipping_mask_name.title: Clipping Mask
clipping_mask_name.description: Name of the label image used as mask for clipping. This image will be binarized. Needs to exist in OME-Zarr file

label_image_cycle.title: Label Cycle
label_image_cycle.description: indicates which cycle contains the label image (only needed if multiplexed)

clipping_mask_cycle.title: Clipping Mask Cycle
clipping_mask_cycle.description: indicates which cycle contains the clipping mask (only needed if multiplexed)

output_label_cycle.title: Output Label Cycle
output_label_cycle.description: indicates in which cycle to store the result (only needed if multiplexed)

output_label_name.title: Output Label Name
output_label_name.description: Name of the output label image.

level.title: Level
level.description: Resolution of the label image to calculate overlap. Only tested for level 0

overwrite.title: Overwrite
overwrite.description: If True, overwrite existing label image.
